summary: The wife of Nasim, an Afghan immigrant in Iran, is gravely ill. He needs money to pay for her care, but his day labor digging wells does not pay enough. A friend connects Nasim to a two-bit... See full summary Â»
cast: Mahshid Afsharzadeh|Firouz Kiani|Samira Makhmalbaf|Mohammad Reza Maleki|Esmail Soltanian|Moharram Zaynalzadeh
title: Bicycleran
